description: Kyle Kirk has a disagreement on the tennis court with partner MarcAmon -- was the ball in or out? And where's a line judge when youreally need one? The two manage to work things out to their mutualsatisfaction without a judge back in the locker room. Kyle gets royallyplowed by Marc, and the view is doubled by the mirror in the lockerroom. The action culminates in Kyle producing one of the biggestcum-shots.
title: Hold Everything, Scene #04
